```{r, include = FALSE}
require(COVID19)
require(DT)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
cn <- c("date","administrative_area_level_1","administrative_area_level_2","administrative_area_level_3","tests","confirmed","deaths","recovered","hosp","vent","icu")

x1 <- covid19("MKD", level = 1, verbose = FALSE, vintage = TRUE)
x2 <- covid19("MKD", level = 2, verbose = FALSE, vintage = TRUE)
x3 <- covid19("MKD", level = 3, verbose = FALSE, vintage = TRUE)

s1 <- attr(x1, "src")
s2 <- attr(x2, "src")
s3 <- attr(x3, "src")

src <- bind_rows(s1,s2,s3)
x   <- bind_rows(x1,x2,x3)

err <- read.csv("https://storage.covid19datahub.io/rawdata.log", cache = FALSE) %>%
  dplyr::filter(iso_alpha_3=="MKD")

x <- x %>% group_by(id) %>% filter(row_number()==n()) %>% ungroup() %>% select_at(cn) %>% na_if(0) 
if(is.null(x3)){
  x$administrative_area_level_3 <- NULL
  if(is.null(x2))
    x$administrative_area_level_2 <- NULL
} 

src <- src %>% filter(data_type %in% colnames(x)) %>% distinct(title, .keep_all = TRUE)
src <- paste(sprintf("[%s](%s)", src$title, src$url), collapse = ", ")
```

Data COVID-19 North Macedonia: `tests` (cumulative number of tests), `confirmed` (cumulative number of confirmed cases), `deaths` (cumulative number of deaths), `recovered` (cumulative number of recovered), `hosp` (hospitalized on date), `vent` (requiring ventilation on date), `icu` (intensive therapy on date). See the [full dataset](/articles/data.html).

```{r, echo=FALSE}
DT::datatable(x, rownames = FALSE, filter = 'top', options = list(
  pageLength = 5, scrollX = TRUE, autoWidth = FALSE
))
```

Data Sources: `r src`
